channel.title: Comments on: Caching and Processing 2TB Mozilla Crash Reports

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/04/12/caching-and-processing-2tb-mozilla-crash-reports/#comment-3684">Lloyd Budd</a>.
I personally have only submitted very few and none recently.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lloyd Budd.

I personally have only submitted very few and none recently.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description: I wonder that too. I know I'm sending in more than my fair share as I try to use Firebug in Firefox 4.
item.content:encoded: I wonder that too. I know I’m sending in more than my fair share as I try to use Firebug in Firefox 4.
